definitions: in a way that is characterized by comprehension of the parts of something as intimately interconnected and explicable only by reference to the whole

examples.text: the damage caused by unethical behavior needs to be examined holistically

shortDefinitions: in way that is characterized by belief that parts of something are intimately interconnected

definitions: in a way that treats the whole person, taking into account mental and social factors, rather than just the symptoms of a disease

examples.text: he has been treated holistically for a heart murmur

shortDefinitions: in way that treats whole person
